summary.title: Summary
summary.intro: Introduced to computers since the age of 7 and in the profession for over 15 years. Participated in many projects, in roles from developer to architect & technical leader. I can understand business goals, translate goals into technical requirements, develop solution architecture, write code and deploy the finished solution in a productive environment. I like to do research tasks and propose the best solution given the constraints. I have expertise in software solutions from microservices to enterprise level ERP, CRM, MES solutions. Gained extensive experience in integration solutions using various technologies.
skills: Tech architecture: Systems Design / Problem-Solving / Project Management / Technical Proficiency
.NET: C# / WPF / Avalonia UI / EF / ASP.NET Core / Serilog / Autofac / Mediatr
DB: MS SQL / PostgreSQL / MariaDB / MongoDB
Integrations: JSON / XML / SOAP / REST / gRPC/ RabbitMQ / Robot framework
DevOps: Docker / k8s / Linux / Gitlab CI / CD / Proxmox / Nginx
Tests: Unit, Integration, E2E, xUnit, Moq
3rd party apps research and reverse engineering

schools.name: Moscow University for Industry and Finance
schools.degree: Bachelor of IT and Systems, Information Technology

jobs.title: .NET Senior Software Developer
jobs.description: Responsible for the architecture and development of the desktop application for an AI-powered cloud medical platform.

responsibilities.title: Development of a modern multi-platform desktop application based on .NET 8 Avalonia UI:
details: high-speed multithreaded processing and uploading of 2d/3d images
architecture and development of plug-ins for third-party medical software (both official and unsupported)
completely rewritten application from monolithic to client-server architecture, using gRPC
writing unit and integration tests using xUnit and Moq

responsibilities: Designed the architecture and developed a new application for appointment recording and integration with third-party applications. (.NET 8 Avalonia UI)
Architecture and development of the companion web app for a core application, based on .NET 8 ASP.NET Core Mongo
Analyze, reverse-engineer, integrate with third-party applications and services using Robot Processing Automation (RPA Framework), DBs, REST, etc.
CICD GitLab processes tuning and maintenance
Code reviews, developers mentorship, job interviews

Tech stack summary: .NET 7/8, Avalonia UI, xUnit, Moq, Autofac, Serilog, MediatR, Dapper, DynamicData, Fluent*, fo-dicom, gRPC, Hangfire, LiteDB, SqLite, EF, Onnx, NAPS2, ImageSharp, CommunityToolkit.Mvvm, NAudio, Velopack, AspNetCore, MongoDb

jobs.title: Senior Software Developer / Team lead
jobs.description: Responsible for the architecture and development of the desktop application for an AI-powered cloud medical platform.
responsibilities: Participate in projects as a lead developer, technical architect, team lead (3 to 17 team members), performance expert.
Build apps architecture and develop most-critical parts of apps
Develop web services and integration (using REST, SOAP, oData, SQL, RabbitMQ, XML, JSON) between apps (1C, SAP, DAX)

Develop custom ERP for an oil service company (1C)
Develop web ERP for a manufacturing company (1C)
